content:
I am a software engineer with multidisciplinary educations in business and IT. I have more than a decade of industry experience in programming, software architecture, business analysis and agile project management. For more details please visit my LinkedIn profile
My current workplace is Aligent Consulting - an awards winning team that always deliver top quality code to solve challenging e-commerce requirements.
On my own time I contribute to open source projects and learn about emerging technologies. I have also co-founded and managed profiting start-ups since 2013.
I enjoy fishing, practicing kendo and taking photos.

title: William Tran
